alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Deaf Smith; Hartley; Oldham; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 04 at 6:43PM CST until March 04 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM CST SATURDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WESTERN AND CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE WESTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WESTERN AND CENTRAL OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE WESTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron and Texas. In Texas... Dallam...Sherman...Hartley...Oldham and Deaf Smith. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...10 to 12 percent for Saturday. * Red Flag Threat Index...4 to 6 for Saturday. * Timing...10 AM through 7 PM on Saturday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.

area.areaDesc: Dallam; Deaf Smith; Hartley; Oldham; Sherman
